name: Snom
description: The Worm Pokemon. Within its internal organs, Snom amplifies the frigid air it gets from eating snow and then uses this amplified air to create icicle-like spikes.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon can ignore a negative status condition that results from an enemy move.

abilities.name: Ice Scales
abilities.description: This Pokémon has resistance to damange dealt by moves whose power is one of INT, WIS, or CHA.
